summary: Two surfing lovers, whose doomed relationship is nearing to a close, find themselves swept into a dimension-traversing wave that sends them into a beach movie musical in the 60's.
cast: Ross Lynch|Maia Mitchell|Gracie Gillam|Garrett Clayton|John DeLuca|Chrissie Fit|Suzanne Cryer|Barry Bostwick|Kevin Chamberlin|Steve Valentine|Jordan Fisher|Kent Boyd|Mollee Gray|William T. title: Teen Beach Movie
